Users

Class Passenger

  • java.lang.Object
    • Users.User
      • Users.Passenger

  • public class Passenger
extends User
    OVERVIEW: This immutable abstraction represents a passenger who will be using the system. AF(c) = a person/user, p, who only wants to board a train. c's name is p.name. RepInvariant: c.name!= null i.e. same as parent class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Passenger(TrainManagementSystem tms, java.lang.String name)
      Effects: Creates a passenger Modifies: this Requires: tms != null and name!=null

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean boardTrain(Train t)
      Effects: Boards this passenger to a train and returns true if successful Requires: t!=null
      void CommandLineUserDisplay()
      Effects: This presents an interface for a passenger to interact with the system through console.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Effects: Returns a string rep representation of a passenger

        getName, repOK

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

      • CommandLineUserDisplay

        public void CommandLineUserDisplay()
        Effects: This presents an interface for a passenger to interact with the system through console. It presents them with a list of trains and lets them select one.
